comments.description: Balanced settings with ATR dynamic targets AND trend filtering
comments.atr_enabled: TRUE - Using dynamic targets based on volatility
comments.safety_limits: Min 0.25% / Max 2.0% targets to prevent extremes
comments.trend_filter: TRUE - Only takes signals aligned with market trend
comments.trend_logic: Price > both EMAs = BULLISH (LONG only), Price < both = BEARISH (SHORT only), Between = NEUTRAL (both)
comments.note: To disable trend filter, set use_trend_filter: false
